newsArray.title: Asha Bhosle's Granddaughter And Mohammed Siraj: Viral Photo Sparks Buzz
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: Legendary singer Asha Bhosle granddaughter Zanai Bhosle recently celebrated her 23rd birthday in Bandra, Mumbai. The event sparked buzz on social media as pictures from the celebration went viral, particularly one featuring Indian cricketer Mohammed Siraj.In her Instagram post, Zanai shared moments with her grandmother Asha Bhosle, actor Jackie Shroff, actress Ayesha Khan, and cricketers Shreyas Iyer and Siddhesh Lad. However, her candid photo with Siraj became the center of speculation, with fans buzzing about a possible relationship. Many flooded the comments with playful remarks, some even referring to Zanai as "Bhabhi."Check below viral post... View this post on Instagram A post shared by Zanai Bhosleüíú (@zanaibhosle)Despite the rumors, neither Siraj nor Zanai has addressed the speculation. Professionally, Siraj continues to shine as a cricketer and was recently appointed as a Deputy Superintendent of Police (DSP) in Hyderabad in October 2024.Meanwhile, Zanai is preparing for her acting debut in the film "The Pride of Bharat ‚Äì Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj", where she will portray Rani Sai Bhosle, wife of Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj.Also on ABP Live | 'Sold Poori Sabzi To Pay Off Loans': Ex-India Player's Shocking ConfessionWho is Zanai Bhosle?Zanai is not just an aspiring actress but also a talented singer and dancer. She began singing at the age of 10 and has a passion for playing guitar, basketball, and drama. With a vibrant personality, she is carving her own niche in the entertainment industry.Also on ABP Live | India's White-Ball Legends: Players With Most Appearances In ICC White-Ball TournamentsMohammed Siraj determined to 'prove a point'Determined to make a statement after being excluded from India's squad for ICC Champions Trophy 2025, Mohammed Siraj is set to feature for Hyderabad in their upcoming Ranji Trophy 2024-25 match against Himachal Pradesh at Hyderabad's Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium, between January 23 and January 26.

newsArray.title: Padma Awards Announced: R Ashwin Gets Padma Shri, Sreejesh Bags Padma Bhushan - Full List
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: The Government of India revealed the list of Padma Award recipients on Saturday, January 25, which included five distinguished sports personalities among the honorees.Ravichandran Ashwin, widely regarded as one of the finest spinners of modern cricket, was honored with the Padma Shri. The legendary off-spinner recently announced his retirement from international cricket in the middle of Border-Gavaskar Trophy 2024-25.Alongside Ashwin, football icon IM Vijayan, Paralympic archer Harvinder Singh, and veteran coach Satyapal Singh were also recipients of the Padma Shri. Former Indian hockey goalkeeper PR Sreejesh received the prestigious Padma Bhushan. These esteemed awards are set to be presented on the eve of Republic Day.Also on ABP Live | Asha Bhosle's Granddaughter And Mohammed Siraj: Viral Photo Sparks BuzzRavichandran Ashwin was honored with the Padma Shri for his exceptional contributions to cricket. As India's leading wicket-taker in Test cricket with 537 wickets from 106 matches, Ashwin has solidified his legacy as one of the finest spinners in modern-day cricket.PR Sreejesh, regarded as one of India's greatest hockey goalkeepers, was conferred with the Padma Bhushan. Sreejesh played a crucial role in India's back-to-back Olympic bronze medals, including the recent one in Paris.Announcing his retirement before the Paris Olympics, he ensured his final Olympic appearance was memorable. Following his retirement, Sreejesh has taken up the role of head coach for India's junior men's hockey team, continuing to contribute to the future of hockey in India.Harvinder Singh, who secured India's 4th gold medal at Paris Paralympics 2024 in Men's Individual Recurve Open final, has been honored with the Padma Shri award.Also receiving the Padma Shri is IM Vijayan, the legendary footballer who captained the Indian national team from 2000 to 2004, for his outstanding contributions to Indian football.Full listRavichandran Ashwin - Padma Bhushan PR Sreejesh - Padma BhushanHarvinder Singh - Padma ShriIM Vijayan - Padma ShriSatyapal Singh - Padma Shri

newsArray.description: Former Indian cricketer Ravichandran Ashwin and hockey icon PR Sreejesh have been awarded the prestigious Padma Awards. Ashwin has been honoured with Padma Shri, while Sreejesh has been conferred with the Padma Bhushan.

newsArray.title: Padma Awards Announced: R Ashwin Gets Padma Shri, Sreejesh Bags Padma Bhushan - Full List
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: The Government of India revealed the list of Padma Award recipients on Saturday, January 25, which included five distinguished sports personalities among the honorees.Ravichandran Ashwin, widely regarded as one of the finest spinners of modern cricket, was honored with the Padma Shri. The legendary off-spinner recently announced his retirement from international cricket in the middle of Border-Gavaskar Trophy 2024-25.Alongside Ashwin, football icon IM Vijayan, Paralympic archer Harvinder Singh, and veteran coach Satyapal Singh were also recipients of the Padma Shri. Former Indian hockey goalkeeper PR Sreejesh received the prestigious Padma Bhushan. These esteemed awards are set to be presented on the eve of Republic Day.Also on ABP Live | Asha Bhosle's Granddaughter And Mohammed Siraj: Viral Photo Sparks BuzzRavichandran Ashwin was honored with the Padma Shri for his exceptional contributions to cricket. As India's leading wicket-taker in Test cricket with 537 wickets from 106 matches, Ashwin has solidified his legacy as one of the finest spinners in modern-day cricket.PR Sreejesh, regarded as one of India's greatest hockey goalkeepers, was conferred with the Padma Bhushan. Sreejesh played a crucial role in India's back-to-back Olympic bronze medals, including the recent one in Paris.Announcing his retirement before the Paris Olympics, he ensured his final Olympic appearance was memorable. Following his retirement, Sreejesh has taken up the role of head coach for India's junior men's hockey team, continuing to contribute to the future of hockey in India.Harvinder Singh, who secured India's 4th gold medal at Paris Paralympics 2024 in Men's Individual Recurve Open final, has been honored with the Padma Shri award.Also receiving the Padma Shri is IM Vijayan, the legendary footballer who captained the Indian national team from 2000 to 2004, for his outstanding contributions to Indian football.Full listRavichandran Ashwin - Padma Bhushan PR Sreejesh - Padma BhushanHarvinder Singh - Padma ShriIM Vijayan - Padma ShriSatyapal Singh - Padma Shri

newsArray.title: Padma Awards 2025: PR Sreejesh conferred with Padma Bhushan, Ravi Ashwin awarded Padma Shri
newsArray.description: Former Indian cricketer Ravichandran Ashwin and hockey icon PR Sreejesh have been awarded the prestigious Padma Awards. Ashwin has been honoured with Padma Shri, while Sreejesh has been conferred with the Padma Bhushan.

newsArray.title: SA20 2025: Paarl Royals becomes first team to bowl 20 overs of spin in T20s
newsArray.description: The David Miller-led side utilised five spinners in the second innings of the match at Boland Park to restrict the opposition to 129 for seven in its chase of 140.
